name: Story 16 – Create a Task and Add it to a Project
description:
As a project manager,
    I want to create or link a task to a project
    So that I can organize and track project deliverables effectively.

the relationship between the TODO and the project is deleted successfully
the TODO no longer appears in the project’s task list

    So that I can keep the project task list accurate and up to date.

    I associate a project with a category
    So that I can classify and filter projects effectively.

name: Story 20 – Retrieve all TODOs for a given Category
description:
As a user,
    I want to view all TODOs assigned to a specific category
    So that I can focus on tasks of the same priority or theme.
